title: Fork, 1985-103-74, ca. 1621
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Four slightly curved pointed tines. Sloping shoulders and long baluster-shaped neck. Tapered handles with flat sides, open scrolls at the top. Engraved figural designs; two figures on front and back, illegible inscription below each figure.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
